segments.text: There's something almost comical about the woman's complete lack of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, methodically drying a dish, while a flood erupts at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The continuous sheet of water pouring from the sink is quite a sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel a bit queasy, seeing all that water on the kitchen floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I also find myself smiling at the children's audacity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are clearly working together, a tiny team of cookie thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's grip on that cookie jar must be firm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the girl is reaching up, palm open, is just priceless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a perfect snapshot of childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the adult discovers them or the stool tips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a strange blend of danger and domestic humor.
segments.speaker: PAR
